input_text:
Job Title: Content Editor with Graphic Design Background

Location: United States

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Marketing, Public Relations, Writing/Editing

Description:
Role: Content Editor with Graphic Design BackgroundLocation: RemoteDuration: Indefinite 
NOTE FROM FOUNDERS:Before diving into all the nitty-gritty, let's infuse a touch of MITA flavor into this job post.
MITA isn't your run-of-the-mill fintech startup; we're not just another financial platform – we're a disruptive force in the music and finance industry. A brand that continually seeks to revolutionize the way artists connect with their audience through investment. And yes, to clarify, for our users, we're a comprehensive platform for artists to raise money from ;)
We founded MITA because we wanted to empower artists with innovative opportunities and connect them with their most visionary investors, their fans. MITA stands apart by redefining the art of investment, elevating artists to new heights by allowing them to get that much needed capital to grow.
You’ll be expanding our online presence, we're looking for someone who can help us create compelling content for our social media platforms.
This role holds a special place in my heart (M) as the individual stepping into it will be my partner in driving MITA's vision forward. With that said, best of luck with your application. Peace.
M&A
Responsibilities:
● Collaborate with the marketing team to develop content strategies aligned with our brand vision and goals.● Create visually appealing graphics, images, and videos for social media posts, ensuring consistency in style and messaging.● Write engaging and concise copy for social media captions, blog posts, and other marketing materials.● Edit and proofread content to maintain high quality and accuracy.● Stay updated on industry trends and best practices to continuously improve our content strategy.
Requirements:
● Proven experience in content editing and graphic design- copywriting is a plus.● Proficiency in graphic design tools such as Adobe Photoshop, Illustrator, or Canva.● Impeccable attention to detail.● Ability to work independently and meet deadlines in a fast-paced environment.● A creative mindset with a passion for storytelling and visual communication.● Prior experience with social media management is a plus.
Why Join Us:
●  Opportunity to make a real impact and contribute to the growth of a startup.● Flexible work hours and remote work option.● Collaborative and supportive work culture.● Room for growth and advancement as the company expands.
If this job post resonates with you, we want to hear from you! Please submit your resume and portfolio (including examples of your graphic design work).
Let's create cool sh*t together!

Experience Level (if available): None

Edit and proofread content to maintain high quality and accuracy
Stay updated on industry trends and best practices
